mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(price*num),0) from dj_deliver_order_split_item where order_split_id = #{orderSplitId}

SELECT sd.supplier_id supplierId, sd.supplier_name supplierName, sd.supplier_telephone supplierTelephone, si.house_id houseId, sum(si.sup_cost * si.num) totalPrice, sum( (si.price * si.num) - (si.sup_cost * si.num) ) totalProfit FROM `dj_deliver_order_split_item` si INNER JOIN dj_deliver_split_deliver sd ON si.split_deliver_id = sd.id AND sd.supplier_id IS NOT NULL WHERE si.house_id= #{houseId} GROUP BY sd.supplier_id, si.house_id

SELECT s.supervisor_id supervisorId, s.supervisor_name supervisorName, s.supervisor_tel supervisorTel, s.number, s.create_date createDate, sum(si.price * si.num) totalPrice, sum( (si.price * si.num) - (si.sup_cost * si.num) ) totalProfit FROM `dj_deliver_order_split` s INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order_split_item si ON si.order_split_id = s.id INNER JOIN dj_deliver_split_deliver sd ON si.split_deliver_id = sd.id AND sd.supplier_id IS NOT NULL WHERE sd.supplier_id =#{supplierId} and s.house_id =#{houseId} GROUP BY sd.number ORDER BY s.create_date DESC

SELECT si.image, si.product_name productName, si.product_sn productSn, si.sup_cost supCost, si.num, si.price, (si.price * si.num) totalPrice, ( (si.price * si.num) - (si.sup_cost * si.num) ) totalProfit FROM `dj_deliver_order_split` s INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order_split_item si ON si.order_split_id = s.id WHERE s.number = #{number} ORDER BY si.create_date DESC

SELECT si.image, si.product_name productName, si.product_sn productSn, si.product_id productId, sum(si.num) num, (si.price * si.num) totalPrice FROM `dj_deliver_order_split` s INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order_split_item si ON si.order_split_id = s.id WHERE s.house_id = #{houseId} GROUP BY si.product_sn ORDER BY si.create_date DESC

SELECT sd.supplier_id supplierId, sd.supplier_name supplierName, sd.supplier_telephone supplierTelephone, si.house_id houseId, sum(si.num) num, sd.send_time sendTime, si.create_date createDate, sd.number, si.price, sum(si.price * si.num) totalPrice FROM `dj_deliver_order_split_item` si INNER JOIN dj_deliver_split_deliver sd ON si.split_deliver_id = sd.id AND sd.supplier_id IS NOT NULL WHERE si.house_id = #{houseId} AND si.product_sn = #{productSn} GROUP BY sd.supplier_id, si.house_id ORDER BY si.house_id
